beer.name: XS: Imperial Stout
beer.description: The Emperor of Stouts. Rich in texture, broad, soft and creamy. The strongest and fullest of all stouts.
beer.grains: Great Western, Harrington & Klages, Hugh Baird XLT-80, Black, Munich, Chocolate and rolled oats.
Great Western, Harrington & Klages, Hugh Baird XLT-80, Black, Munich, Chocolate and rolled oats.
